Package com.yinhai.ta404.core.restservice.interceptor

Class RestServiceExceptionInterceptor

java.lang.Object
com.yinhai.ta404.core.restservice.BaseRestService
com.yinhai.ta404.core.restservice.interceptor.RestServiceExceptionInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBaseRestService
@ControllerAdvice @Order(101) @DependsOn("serviceLocator") public class RestServiceExceptionInterceptor extends BaseRestService
应用拦截器,对抛出的异常进行拦截处理
Since:
5.0
